entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning except snow over the Highlands late in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
